pageTitle: A big step: The search for Sasquatch | CanyonCourier.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {36281=Copyright © 2015, 28657=Canyon Courier | circulation@canyoncourier.com | 303-350-1030 27902 Meadow Drive, Ste 200, Evergreen, CO 80439 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 22875=Editor’s note: Scout around Google Earth these days, and you might be astonished by what you find — such as the report by a man who claimed he spotted bigfoot between Kittredge and Indian Hills in 1974. He was a boy at the time, hiking with his brothers and the family dog. The incident scared him so badly he nearly choked the dog to death with its leash while climbing a tree.}
